sect1.title: General
sect1.para: ComServer_CL is an interface between the usual communication protocols like CAN bus, Ethernet or internal signals and the SOME/IP service oriented communication protocol. It provides and requests SOME/IP services. For signal to service mapping it reads the signal from CAN bus, Ethernet or an internal signal(from SWC) through RTE_light then assigns it to the corresponding property of the service after a transformation if it is needed. In case of service to signal mapping it transforms the received property if necessary then assigns it to the correspondig signal through RTE_light. In some cases ComServ_CL is responsible for PDU controlling on CAN bus or Ethernet.
